body.name: Steamer Iron for Clothes Travel Mini, 8 Steam & Iron Modes Portable Handheld Garment Steam for Clothing, Support 2 in 1 Dry and Wet Ironing 180° Rotatable, Travel and Home College Dorm Essentials

features: 【8 Temperatures Available】Eight different temperature modes provide versatile steaming options for any fabric from cotton, wool, silk, fiber etc. , making it suitable for clothes, curtains, furniture, toys and so much more. This mini steamer iron is essential for the home and ideal for college.

【Iron & Steamer 2 In 1】This iron is not only a mini iron but also a steamer, making it ideal for travelling. Press the spray button to switch it from dry mode to steam mode. The handle rotates 180°, making it capable of ironing a garment lying flat and steaming a garment that is hanging from a coat hanger.

【Powerful & Auto Shut-off】It has up to 1200 watts of power for a speedy, 5-second heat-up and automatically stops heating up when the iron senses your hands have moved away. No need to worry about the tank running out of water, as an alarm will sound automatically to alert you that the tank needs to be refilled. Also enjoy safe dry ironing without the risk of burns and water spills.

【Enlarged Ironing Panel & Powerful Steamer】The handheld clothes steamer has a large ironing surface. This 40Kpa micro-boost design means high pressure penetrates through the fibers of the clothes, allowing you to quickly iron clothing and other wrinkled items.

【Travel Essential & Must-Have】The compact size make this portable steamer iron is perfect for travel, vacation and outing use. By using this mini steamer, you will always have a tidy outfit at home, work for a night out with friends. (Note: Garment Steamer is ONLY compatible in countries like the US, Canada, and Japan where the voltage is 110 to 120 volts.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UPGRADED FUNCTIONS This steam iron has a mini design, yet it packs a lot of power and functionality. It's upgraded as a 2-in-1 steamer iron, Compared to normal irons, Our steamer iron can cope with almost all fabrics, and has a better ironing effect with steam. With 1200W high power, the steam and panel can reach 302°F and it only takes 5s to heat up. You don't need to wait any more.
You can easily see the difference between us and other products：

8 Steam & Iron Modes Meet different fabric needs, More protective of your clothes It is capable of both flat ironing and hanging ironing. With steam , it has a better ironing effect and can iron almost all fabrics. Heat up quickly and have several jets to eject steam. it does good job in ironing your clothes. Powerful enough to remove wrinkles and stains from even the most stubborn clothes

TRAVEL ESSENSIALS & MUST HAVE This steamer iron is perfect for travel, vacation and outing use. You can easily put it into your suitcases and backpacks without taking up too much space. Besides, you can also use this steamer abroad simply with a converter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was such a great find! I recently washed my curtains and they came out kinda wrinkled but still hung them up. Now I used this easy light weight to get my curtains back to perfection. Cute, easy to store,light weight and powerful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Use a press cloth with this one.
reviews.reviewText: I iron a lot, and iron everything, just about. I hate dragging out a big ironing board and giant iron every time, so I thought this handy little travel steamer would take some of the work out of getting dressed. It heats up quickly, so be careful of the water - it leaks and drips, and it will spit hot water all over your clothes and ironing board. DO NOT use on anything that shows water spots, like rayon or silk, because it WILL ruin it for good - USE A PRESS-CLOTH BETWEEN THE IRON AND FABRIC, if it's decent or nice fabric. It's good for jeans, some cotton shirts, or flannel, but keep it away from your nice clothes. I should have known better, but the box depicts a steam flow that would perfectly de-wrinkle a canvas tarp, but don't fall for this like i kind of did. It's nothing like that. It's a tiny, strange little steam iron that will work well traveling, once you get the hang of it. A Fahrenheit scale would be nice , and I wish it had a pointy end to get in small places. I would say it's okay, but a little misrepresented with the steam picture on the box. I think this iron is fine, and I would take it on a trip where I wasn't preregistered in a hotel/motel, just in case... 4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure what to expect since I’ve never used a steamer but this thing works wonders on all my wrinkled clothes!! Heats up quick and perfect for a last minute touch up!! Really glad I took the chance on this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use, Gets Super Hot, Handy
reviews.reviewText: This little steamer/iron is great and I was even able to steam a huge woven basket that I purchased online. It gets really hot, so be careful! I wouldn’t pay more than $25-$30 for this, anything above I feel like you could find better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT LITTLE STEAMER
reviews.reviewText: AS I GROW MY CROCHET BUSINESS, I FIND MYSELF IN NEED OF ALL SORTS OF GADGETS AND NOTIONS THAT I OTHERWISE WOULD HAVE NO USE FOR. THIS HERE PORTABLE STEAM IRON IS FOR A PROCESS CALLED “BLOCKING”. YOU CAN WET BLOCK OR STEAM BLOCK AND I NOW PREFER THE METHOD OF STEAM BLOCKING. THIS LITTLE STEAM IRON CAN BE TITLED TO A 180 DEGREES ANGLE. IT WAS REASONABLY PRICED SO I WILL BE BUYING MORE FOR THE CLASSES I TEACH.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Neat little iron
reviews.reviewText: This is a handy little iron. It heated quickly. I filled it with water but did not know how to control the steam function. The steam was either on always or off. I also was curious what the little images on the LED screen indicated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came with glove!
reviews.reviewText: This is very great price I love how it came together with the glove to protect our hand while do the ironing ! Totally worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for touch-ups
reviews.reviewText: Keep in mind I do very little ironing because I’ve never been good at it and only a few of my clothing items get wrinkled. I got this in case I need to smooth out a shirt if I plan on dressing up a bit. Now that we got that out of the way, this little iron seems like it will fit the bill. I tested it on an older shirt in case I did something wrong. I made an “ironing board “ using a towel on the granite kitchen counter. The iron heated up in a reasonable amount of time. I didn’t use the steam option. I set it to what the shirt label said and away I went. The handy setting indicator worked well. Between my inexperience and the homemade ironing board the shirt came out noticeably smoother and acceptable to me. I think this will suit my needs. I imagine if you need to do a pile of ironing you’d want a bigger heavier iron but for small jobs this will certainly do the job. I will need to get an ironing board now.
